title: Allow to set accelerometer sensor's sensitivity in UWP
body:
In desktop's AP, it can be set by SENSOR_PROPERTY_CHANGE_SENSITIVITY property:
https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/dd318991(v=vs.85).aspx
But it has no similar property on UWP's api.

comments.body:
When the machine is idle on the table, accelerometer sensor usually has very small data change(<0.01).
But the small data change should be ignore.
